Package org.forgerock.openidm.filter

Class PassthroughFilter

java.lang.Object
org.forgerock.openidm.filter.PassthroughFilter
All Implemented Interfaces:
org.forgerock.json.resource.Filter
public class PassthroughFilter extends Object implements org.forgerock.json.resource.Filter
Passthrough filter forwards all requests to the next handler unchanged.
